Articles.Content:
**Could this please NOT be moved to Mod support? The issue isn't with a single mod, but with ALL mods that have a UI, hence with my KSP configuration.

.22 is not showing the UI for any mods I load - MechJeb, Protractor, Engineer, etc. The parts are there and I can attach them, but nothing shows to control them either in the VAB or on the pad.

Any thoughts? I reloaded .22 and tried them each one at a time as well with no joy.

Thanks!

It would sound like you didn't install them correctly, but since it's so many mods I highly doubt that's the case. Unles you made a consistand error

Are you seeing the normal AI? F2 toggles that one

**Could this please NOT be moved to Mod support? The issue isn't with a single mod, but with ALL mods that have a UI, hence with my KSP configuration.

But since it is about mods it belongs in the add-on subforum. If you have an issue with the core game without any mods installed whatsoever, feel free to post in the bugs & support section.

Also, please don't make multiple threads regarding the same issue, patiently wait for replies to your original thread.

Thread closed.
